item.title: Java Apache Kafak Study
item.description: Kafka Theory =>:send to data sources =>topics => partition => offsets data is randomly sent to the partition unless the key is provided brokers and topics kafka cluster is composed of multiple brokers(servers) broker contains topics' partitions connect to any broker, then connect to whole cluster topics replication if one broker is down, another broker can serve the data. one broker can be leader for a given partition.
